intro: Psychotria mayumbensis, commonly known as Mayumbé psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of Africa, particularly the Democratic Republic of the Congo. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It thrives in moist, shaded environments within rainforests. The species is of interest to botanists due to its unique morphology and potential ecological significance.
